altername_name: Chopper Attack III: Raid on Pearl Harbour
Chopper Attack 3: Raid on Pearl Harbour
name: Chopper Attack Three: Raid on Pearl Harbour
overview: Chopper Attack Three: Raid on Pearl Harbour is a single player shooter in which you play a Japanese pilot involved in the attack on Pearl Harbor during the second world war. The game was developed by the SEUCK Design Group and released into the public domain in 1989.
